intro: Reevesia taiwanensis, commonly known as the Taiwan Reevesia, is a rare flowering plant native to Taiwan. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. It thrives in shaded, moist environments, often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
